Package com.senseidb.indexing.hadoop.reduce

Class Summary
FileSystemDirectory This class implements a Lucene Directory on top of a general FileSystem.
IndexUpdateOutputFormat The record writer of this output format simply puts a message in an output path when a shard update is done.
RAMDirectoryUtil A utility class which writes an index in a ram dir into a DataOutput and read from a DataInput an index into a ram dir.
SenseiCombiner This combiner combines multiple intermediate forms into one intermediate form.
SenseiReducer  
ShardWriter The initial version of an index is stored in the perm dir.
